select
from daoxin_crm_order_detail where 1 = 1
and detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.detailId},'%')
and order_id = #{paramCondition.orderId}
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and customer_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.customerId},'%')
and paper_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.paperType},'%')

select
from view_order_detail detail LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( orders.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) MONTH, DATE_FORMAT( orders.create_time, '%Y' ) YEAR, sum( record.payment_amount ) AS payment_amount FROM daoxin_crm_payment_record record LEFT JOIN daoxin_crm_order orders ON record.order_id = orders.order_id AND orders.display = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND record.display = 1 GROUP BY MONTH ) payment ON detail.`MONTH` = payment.`MONTH` AND detail.`YEAR` = payment.`YEAR`
where 1 = 1
and detail.year = #{paramCondition.year}
and date_format(detail.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.startTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
and date_format(detail.create_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY month
